Posts.Content: On May 12, 2014 4:14 PM pipperpain wrote: if you were on facebook i would click like for this comment i am a 3 yr survivor ofstage 4 bc God bless you pipperpain! I am so happy to hear that!
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.

Posts.Content: Vickie, this is my first night on this blog.  I just want to let you know that I am praying for you!  I'm on a pre cancer treatment and I am thankful, however I know cancer well, it has unfortunately visited many of my family members - not a welcome guest.  I just wanted to let you know that I am praying for you!  God bless you!
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.
